description: WarmWeb transforms how websites are created and hosted by bringing the Vercel experience to Filecoin’s Onchain Cloud. From November 2024 to September 2025, WarmWeb evolved from a proof-of-concept into a functional platform enabling AI-generated, Filecoin-hosted static sites served through subdomains on warmweb.xyz. It introduced seamless integration with FilCDN, WarmStorage, and Synapse SDK, proving decentralized hosting can rival traditional cloud performance. By empowering creators to instantly publish and verify their content on-chain, WarmWeb advances the mission of open, transparent, and censorship-resistant web publishing within the Filecoin ecosystem.
additional_impact: Beyond its technical innovation, WarmWeb has made an impact by bridging AI, web publishing, and decentralized infrastructure. It showcases how Filecoin can power real-world, creator-focused applications—not just storage utilities. WarmWeb has inspired developers across multiple hackathon waves to explore frontend and AI integrations on Filecoin, helping position the ecosystem as a viable foundation for next-generation tools. By demonstrating seamless content serving from decentralized sources, WarmWeb contributes to Filecoin’s broader narrative of usability, accessibility, and adoption—paving the way for more AI-driven, user-friendly Web3 experiences.
end_user:
WarmWeb contributes to the Filecoin ecosystem by pioneering a serverless, onchain web publishing platform—a decentralized alternative to Vercel and Netlify. It demonstrates how AI-generated static sites can be deployed, stored, and served entirely through Filecoin Onchain Cloud, using Synapse SDK, WarmStorage, and FilCDN for end-to-end hosting.

Its impact lies in proving that decentralized infrastructure can deliver real-world usability and performance, making it easier for developers, DAOs, and creators to host verifiable, censorship-resistant websites without centralized servers. WarmWeb bridges the gap between AI creativity and Filecoin’s decentralized storage, expanding Filecoin’s reach into frontend deployment and Web3 publishing tools.
testimonials:
WarmWeb has actively participated in the Filecoin Onchain Cloud WaveHack program (Waves 1–3), where it received positive feedback from mentors and evaluators on its architecture, Filecoin integration (FilCDN, WarmStorage, Synapse SDK), and overall impact potential. Formal testimonials from ecosystem developers and WaveHack reviewers are planned for publication in upcoming evaluation rounds.

governance_accessibility_impact: WarmWeb enhances governance accessibility by lowering technical and infrastructure barriers for contributors and ecosystem participants. By enabling anyone to deploy verifiable, onchain websites directly on Filecoin—without centralized servers or DevOps complexity—it empowers communities, DAOs, and projects to publish proposals, updates, and transparency reports openly. This decentralization of publishing ensures that governance materials remain tamper-proof, auditable, and permanently accessible, fostering greater participation and trust within the Filecoin ecosystem. Through its Filecoin-native infrastructure, WarmWeb turns web publishing into a governance-enabling tool that invites more members to engage and contribute.
